name: Behold (auxiliaryCarry)
description:
Behold is the name of an old Keep that’s full of Beholders, unsurprisingly. It’s also home for you, the Player, if only for a brief moment. You have been cursed, and grim fate awaits you! Quite literally in fact, you might die in about 25 seconds from the start of the game.

Fast paced FPS combat with beholders, ticking death clock and choices that have fun consequences.

Slash your way through the keep, collect Skulls to keep the curse at bay and change the rules of the game. Should you ever succumb to adversity, remember you can always come back - for a price.

Controls

  1. WASD to move around
  2. Mouse to look around
  3. Left click to swing your weapon
  4. Right click to throw it at an enemy

Music credit:

Joseph Gilbert / Kistol - Lark https://opengameart.org/content/lark
